backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing user profiles with access control, letting users view and save their own profile data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/theme setup defining light/dark color variables and applying global background and text styles.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling login state, onboarding flow, and showing the practice view after setup.
frontend/src/components/chart/ChartImpor: UI component for importing JSON or MIDI note charts, parsing them, and returning structured chart data.
frontend/src/components/feedback/HitFeed: Displays keyboard mapping instructions and shows hit/miss feedback animations based on input timing.
Top-level layout with header, account menu, login/logout handling, footer, and optional name-change dialog.
frontend/src/components/pianoroll/PianoR: Canvas-based falling-note piano roll that draws lanes, notes, and hit state based on timing and input.
frontend/src/components/pianoroll/Transp: Playback controls providing start, pause, stop, and a formatted time display for practice sessions.
frontend/src/components/profile/NameOnbo: Onboarding form that loads and updates the user's profile name with save handling and validation.
frontend/src/components/youtube/YouTubeE: Embeds a YouTube video using an iframe with a styled container and title.
frontend/src/components/youtube/YouTubeP: URL input that validates a YouTube link, extracts the video ID, and triggers loading with error feedback.
frontend/src/features/practice/PracticeV: Main practice screen handling YouTube selection, chart importing, persistence, and rendering playback tools.
frontend/src/features/practice/useHitDet: Hook that detects note hits or misses within a timing window and tracks hit state and hit notes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, invalidating queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity login, persistence, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useKeyboardInput.ts: Maps keyboard events to lane presses and records the last pressed key with timestamps.
Provides a transport hook that tracks play state, current time, and supports start, pause, stop, and seek using requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Wraps react-query calls to fetch and save the callerâ€™s user profile using an actor instance.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom theme variables, dark mode overrides, and scrollbar styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/types/noteChart.ts: Type definitions for Note and NoteChart used in piano-roll rendering and parsing.
frontend/src/utils/chartParsers.ts: Parses JSON note charts into NoteChart objects and provides a placeholder MIDI parser that throws an error.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, storing, and persisting URL parameters using query strings, hash routing, and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/youtube.ts: Validates YouTube URLs and extracts video IDs from standard and short-link formats.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and other theme settings using custom CSS variables.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project state, requirements, existing features, and image needs.
